metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3782 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple incomplete blacklist vulnerabilities in thefilemanager::isFileExclude method in the Media Manager in Dotclear before2.6.3 allow remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary PHP code byuploading a file with a (1) double extension or (2) .php5, (3) .phtml, orsome other PHP file extension.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3782` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dotclear - 2.6.3+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dotclear package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.3+dfsg-1').
